name: nc-one-react-helpers
description: Developments that will simplify the life of a React developer

scripts.build: tsc -d -p . && mkdirp lib/src/styles && xcopy src\styles lib\src\styles
scripts.build-publish: npm run build && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm publish && npm run clear
scripts.build-publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm publish && npm run clear
scripts.build-publish:major: npm run build && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm publish && npm run clear

author: Naruto Minecrafter <www.iwanmayor.com@gmail.com> (https://github.com/NarutoMinecrafter)
